4_page_payment.4_page_payment_2_tv1: This is your brain on disaster
4_page_payment.4_page_payment_2_tv2: Our brains are hardwired to process stress relating to trauma by entering what is known as "fight, flight, freeze" mode before returning to a restful state, explained Susanne Babbel, a psychotherapist specializing in trauma recovery.
